alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:00AM EDT until March 26 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Columbia County in east central Georgia... Central Richmond County in east central Georgia... Southern Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Aiken County in central South Carolina... Southern McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 945 AM EDT. * At 859 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grovetown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Martinez, Aiken Mall, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, Harlem, New Ellenton, Appling, Glendale, South Augusta, Edgefield County Airport, Midtown, Riverwood, Summerville and Augusta Mall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 181 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 27. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
